subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: After Rafael Nadal won an exhilarating third set in the United States Open men’s final, it seemed, for the first time in a year, as if he could solve the Novak Djokovic puzzle.
snippet: After Rafael Nadal won an exhilarating third set in the United States Open men’s final, it seemed, for the first time in a year, as if he could solve the Novak Djokovic puzzle.
